Diwali Lakshmi Puja.sanskrit:
ॐ महालक्ष्म्यै च विद्महे विष्णुपत्नी च धीमहि।
तन्नो लक्ष्मीः प्रचोदयात्॥

जय लक्ष्मी मात कि जय लक्ष्मी मात।
तुमको निशदिन सेवत हरि विष्णु विधात॥
उमा, रमा, ब्रह्माणी तुम ही जगमाता।
सूर्य-चन्द्रमा ध्यावत नारद ऋषि गाता॥
Diwali Lakshmi Puja.transliteration:
Om Mahālakṣmyai Ca Vidmahe Viṣṇupatnī Ca Dhīmahi,
Tanno Lakṣmīḥ Pracodayāt.

Jaya Lakṣmī Māt Ki Jaya Lakṣmī Māt,
Tumako Nishadina Sevat Hari Viṣṇu Vidhāt.
Umā, Ramā, Brahmāṇī Tum Hī Jagamātā,
Sūrya-Candrama Dhyāvat Nārada Ṛṣi Gātā.
Diwali Lakshmi Puja.english: We meditate upon Goddess Mahalakshmi, consort of Lord Vishnu. May that Goddess inspire and bless us. Victory to Mother Lakshmi! You are served day and night by Lord Vishnu and Lord Brahma. You are Uma, Rama, Brahmani, the Mother of the universe. Sun, Moon and sages like Narada meditate upon you.

Navratri Aarti Collection.sanskrit:
जय अम्बे गौरी, मैया जय श्यामा गौरी।
तुमको निशदिन सेवत, हरि विष्णु विधात्री॥

या देवी सर्वभूतेषु मातृरूपेण संस्थिता।
नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमो नमः॥
Navratri Aarti Collection.transliteration:
Jaya Ambe Gaurī, Maiyā Jaya Śyāmā Gaurī,
Tumako Nishadina Sevat, Hari Viṣṇu Vidhātrī.

Yā Devī Sarvabhūteṣu Mātṛrūpeṇa Saṁsthitā,
Namastasyai Namastasyai Namastasyai Namo Namaḥ.
Navratri Aarti Collection.english: Victory to You, O Mother Ambe Gauri, O Shyama Gauri! You are worshipped day and night by Vishnu and Brahma. O Goddess who dwells in all beings in the form of Mother, we bow to You again and again.

Ganesh Chaturthi Puja.sanskrit:
सुखकर्ता दुःखहर्ता वार्ता विघ्नाची।
नुरवी पूर्वी प्रेम कृपा जयाची॥

विघ्ननाशी विनायका वरदायका।।
Ganesh Chaturthi Puja.transliteration:
Sukhkarta Dukhharta Vārtā Vighnāchī,
Nuravī Pūrvī Prema Kṛpā Jayāchī.

Vighnanāśī Vināyakā Varadāyakā.
Ganesh Chaturthi Puja.english: O Ganesha, giver of joy, remover of sorrow and destroyer of obstacles! You bestow your grace and compassion upon devotees and bless them with boons.

Janmashtami Bhajans.sanskrit:
ॐ जय जगदीश हरे, स्वामी जय जगदीश हरे।
भक्तजनों के संकट, क्षण में दूर करे॥

जो ध्यावे फल पावे दुख बिनसे मन का।
स्वामी दुख बिनसे मन का॥
Janmashtami Bhajans.transliteration:
Om Jaya Jagadīś Hare, Swāmī Jaya Jagadīś Hare,
Bhaktajanon Ke Sankat, Kṣaṇa Mein Dūr Kare.

Jo Dhyāve Phal Pāve Dukh Binse Man Kā,
Swāmī Dukh Binse Man Kā.
Janmashtami Bhajans.english: O Lord of the universe, glory to You! O Master, glory to You! You remove the troubles of Your devotees in a moment. Whoever meditates on You attains fruits of devotion and freedom from sorrows of the heart.

Mahashivratri Mantras.sanskrit:
ॐ नमः शिवाय।

त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्।
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्मृत्योर्मुक्षीय माऽमृतात्॥
Mahashivratri Mantras.transliteration:
Om Namaḥ Śivāya.

Tryambakaṁ Yajāmahe Sugandhiṁ Puṣṭi-vardhanam,
Urvārukamiva Bandhanān Mṛtyor Mukṣīya Mā'mṛtāt.
Mahashivratri Mantras.english: Salutations to Lord Shiva. We worship the three-eyed Lord Shiva who nourishes all beings. May He liberate us from the bondage of death, just as the ripe cucumber is severed from its stalk, but not from immortality.
